name: Treasure of Weakness [DEMO]
description:
Uh oh! You're in some abandoned catacombs and you found some treasure! However, the treasure is cursed. The curse makes you weaker and allows ghosts to attack. That's not good! Luckily, escaping the catacombs will destroy the curse! However, you need to face multiple obstacles on the way!

Controls : 

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Spacebar/Mouse Left Click - Shoot

Escape - Pause

Features : 

  • Weakness! You get weaker overtime. You'll attack less efficiently and you'll move slower. Luckily, the ghosts drop orbs that make you stronger. Temporarily of course.
  • Bosses! Fight a boss that lunges at you and tries to spike you! Or fight a flower with the ability to fire a powerful laser! You can also get upgrades for defeating them!
  • Puzzles!* Solve different puzzles!
  • Money back guarantee? Honestly this game will probably become shareware. And it already is!
  • Gooey Death mode....?**

* Not in demo

** Not in demo, playing A Gooey Death is recommended for the best experience

haveeeeee fun!!!! YAY

Created for DOS Game Jam
